aiInsight.title: AI Insight
aiInsight.message: Your energy peaks around 10 AM. Schedule important tasks then for optimal performance.

tasks.noTasks: No tasks yet. Add your first task to get started!

productivity.title: Productivity Peak
productivity.description: You're most productive during morning hours. Schedule important tasks in this window.

energy.title: Energy Pattern
energy.description: Your energy dips after lunch. Consider a short break or light tasks during 2-4 PM.

tasks.title: Task Optimization
tasks.description: You complete 80% more tasks when you break them into smaller chunks.

schedule.title: Schedule Balance
schedule.description: You have 3 high-priority tasks tomorrow. Consider spacing them throughout the day.

learning.title: AI is Learning
learning.description: Keep tracking your tasks and energy. The more data we have, the better insights we can provide!

welcome.title: Welcome to Saturway
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered companion for mindful productivity and balanced living

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.dataSharingDesc: Help improve the app with anonymous data
privacy.dataCollectionDesc: We collect only the data necessary to provide you with the best experience. This includes your tasks, energy tracking data, and usage preferences.
privacy.dataSecurityDesc: Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never sell or share your personal information with third parties.
privacy.yourRightsDesc: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time. Contact us for data export requests.

about.title: About Author
about.description1: Saturway is crafted with dedication to help you achieve mindful productivity and balanced living.
about.description2: Our mission is to combine AI technology with thoughtful design to create tools that respect your time, energy, and mental well-being.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceDesc: By using Saturway, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.
terms.licenseDesc: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use Saturway for personal productivity purposes.
terms.prohibitedDesc: You may not use the app for illegal activities, to harm others, or to violate any applicable laws.
terms.changesDesc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

copyright.title: Copyright & Licenses
copyright.description2: The Saturway name, logo, and design are trademarks of Saturway. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
copyright.opensourceDesc: This app uses open-source libraries licensed under MIT, Apache 2.0, and other permissive licenses. Full attribution can be found in the app repository.
